<title level="1" right="Rules">[Nonplayer Character (NPC)](/Rules.aspx?ID=32)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 13 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A nonplayer character, controlled by the GM, interacts with players and helps advance the story.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Nonplayer Character (NPC)
